OCD.name: CloudService
OCD.description: The CloudService allows for setting a user friendly name for the current device. It also provides the option to compress message payloads to reduce network traffic.

AD.name: device.display-name
AD.description: Friendly name of the device. Device name is the common name of the device (eg: Reliagate 50-21, Raspberry Pi, etc.). Hostname will use the linux hostname utility. Custom allows for defining a unique string. Server defined relies on Eurotech Everware Cloud to define a name.

Option.label: Set display name as device name

AD.name: device.custom-name
AD.description: Custom name for the device. This value is applied ONLY if device.display-name is set to "Custom"

AD.name: encode.gzip
AD.description: Compress message payloads before sending them to the remote server to reduce the network traffic.

AD.name: republish.mqtt.birth.cert.on.gps.lock
AD.description: Whether or not to republish the MQTT Birth Certificate on GPS lock event

AD.name: republish.mqtt.birth.cert.on.modem.detect
AD.description: Whether or not to republish the MQTT Birth Certificate on modem detection event

AD.name: enable.default.subscriptions
AD.description: By disabling default subscriptions the gateway will not be remotely manageable

Option.label: Publish birth on connect and reconnect
